segments.text: Let's do something really nice for our family this Christmas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just know I want to get out of the mindless gift trap .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to give a gift that is really meaningful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Or do something that shows we have spent time thinking about them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Or what only we are able to give them .
segments.speaker: S2
